mapper.insert: INSERT INTO trip.member(id, pw, role, name, member.rank, img_key, created_at) VALUES (#{id},#{pw},#{role},#{name},#{rank},#{imgKey},now())
mapper.update: UPDATE trip.member SET member.rank = CASE WHEN #{completedCount} = 0 THEN 'Bronze' WHEN #{completedCount} = 1 THEN 'Bronze' WHEN #{completedCount} BETWEEN 2 AND 4 THEN 'Silver' WHEN #{completedCount} BETWEEN 5 AND 9 THEN 'Gold' ELSE 'Platinum' END WHERE id = #{memberId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM trip.payment WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND status = 'completed' AND order_time >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 2 YEAR)
